reviewText: I was hoping for a little more fantcy with these beautiful philippna women, just three outa five for me. Maybe if you have seen this you might disagree and thats ok.

This is exactly what is described--a behind the scenes look at 26 photo shoots with a couple dozen of the the Philippines hottest, sexiest models and actresses.  Nearly all of them get at least topless, some fully nude, and a couple of shy ones in their bikinis.  It appears a bit expensive, but please understand that this is an import DVD from PI made by Viva Films. The cost of production, printing, distribution, etc. is more expensive there.  It is a business after all, and Viva Films has a right to make a profit, otherwise, what's the point?  It's not fair to compare this import with locally made DVDs by Sony or Paramount.  If you are a fan of any of these models/actresses, this is a rare glimpse to see them in all their glory!  Where else would you see them shedding their inhibitions besides FHM magazine? Most of them are interviewed with some q & a along with some t & a!  You'll see them getting makeup applied, trying on different swimwear, getting their hair done, chit chatting, and you'll see the photographers snapping away.  The main focus of this DVD is the fact that they are beautiful, exotic,  and have beautiful sexy bodies.  Take it what it's for and this DVD delivers.  I look forward to part 2 and will buy a copy.

Before I start let me first say the editorial did not lie.  This was a behind-the-scene at photo shoots.  And I did see skin.  Beyond that, I did not see $26.00 worth of adult video.  For what this DVD offered I spent about $20 more than I should have.  Nothing against Viva Video, the video showed 26 photo shoots, it showed what goes on behind-the-scene.  My disappointment is more directed towards myself for paying so much for this video.  Word to the wise for anyone that reads this, if they are asking more than $10 for this video page back and continue shopping.  However, if you value the sight of young women with perking breast with dark areolas and you don't mind spending almost $30 for, this is your video.
Great celebrity phot shots all in a building under contstruction or reneuvation in the city of lights Manila Philippines.
